EmailTemplate.name: CR 6.1 Check SAW - DBS status
EmailTemplate.subject: Check your DBS status on the Staffing Website
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact your local staffing team. Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for uploading a copy of your DBS certificate to the Staffing Website. There has been a change to the status of your DBS that may require action.
What do I need to do?
Please login to the Staffing Website and access the Disclosure and Barring Service section under Essential Information. Your ‘DBS status’ will show what the update is and indicate any actions you may need to take.
Click here to login to the Staffing Website: https://staffing.the-challenge.org/Login.aspx?ReturnUrl=%2fsecure%2f
Need more information?
If you are experiencing any problems with your DBS upload or application, please contact your local staffing team, quoting the email reference number below in any correspondence.
Best wishes,
{!Contact.Contact_Owner_Name}
{!Contact.Contact_Owner_email}
The Challenge Email reference: CR 6.1
